txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken daggers from the Dourhands in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Ha! Good to see that the Dourhands are still as worthless in a fight as always. Breaking their own daggers, ha!\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'The Dourhands are still out there to the north and south, and stopping them while we have the chance is a top priority for us Longbeards.'
Dorri wants broken daggers. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the broken daggers to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire broken daggers. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Broken daggers from the Dourhands in Ered Luin.
